thread.title: REVEALED: George Michael's home was secret film set for GAY PORN
thread.title_full: REVEALED: George Michael's home was secret film set for GAY PORN

title: REVEALED: George Michael's home was secret film set for GAY PORN
text:
REVEALED: George Michael's home was secret film set for GAY PORN REVEALED: George Michael's home was secret film set for GAY PORN GEORGE Michael’s home was secretly used as a set for shooting gay porn films, we can reveal. / Published 26th February 2017 
The singer’s £5million mansion became a base for at least two flicks shot while he was away. 
A pal of George has come forward because he is outraged that none of the actors in the films practised safe sex – something he said would have “enraged” George. 
He declared the movies a “desecration” of the hitmaker’s memory as George’s own bed was used for one scene. 
W8MEDIA/GETTY SECRET: George Michael's home in London was used as a gay porn filmset George Michael in pictures Pop icon George Michael in pictures 1 / 16 Getty Images George Michael Performs At Palais Garnier in 2012 “The company who got access specialise in hardcore, ‘bareback’ gay sex in which the actors don’t wear protection” George Michael's friend 
Our insider – who has detailed knowledge of the films but did not want to be named – told the Daily Star Sunday: “At least two gay porn films were shot at George’s house in Highgate, north London, without his knowledge. 
“He had so many hangers-on looking after his homes that somehow word got out they were empty. 
“Unbelievably, a well-known gay porn company got hold of the keys twice and went in with a full crew – actors flown from America, lighting, sound engineers – the lot. 
GETTY UNAWARE: One film was made in 2012 when George was on holiday with boyfriend Fad 
“The company who got access specialise in hardcore, ‘bareback’ gay sex in which the actors don’t wear protection. 
“George would have been furious if he’d known what his house was being used for while he was away.” 
The first film was allegedly shot in August 2011 when George was performing in Prague. 
The second is said to have been made in 2012 when George was on holiday with boyfriend Fadi Fawaz. 
There is no suggestion Fadi had any involvement in giving access to George’s house. 
Our insider said gay porn actors from America were paid £500 each to appear in the films. 
W8MEDIA UNACCEPTABLE: The actors did not practice safe sex 
He added: “They were told at the last minute they were filming in George’s house. I know his bed was used for one scene. 
“The films were released for download and not on disc. They were a cult favourite among the gay community because a lot of people knew they had been secretly shot at George’s house, and it gave buyers an extra kick.” 
GETTY DISGRACEFUL: The Wham star did not know his house was being used to film porn 
Our source said producers have stopped selling the movies since George’s death, fearing a backlash. 
Wham! star George died aged 53 on Christmas Day. Police have described his death as “unexplained but non-suspicious”. 
A post-mortem was “inconclusive” and his funeral has been delayed until next month. Related articles
